bio: On the path to Web3 enlightenment.
contributionDescription: My contributions to the Optimism ecosystem have been vital for the growth and success of this Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. These contributions have come in various forms:  Development; DApps; Security Audits; Documentation and Education; Community Engagement; Integration; Research; and Advocacy and Adoption
impactDescription: My contributions to the Optimism ecosystem have been vital for the growth and success of this Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. These contributions have come in various forms:  Development; DApps; Security Audits; Documentation and Education; Community Engagement; Integration; Research; and Advocacy and Adoption
pwCategorySuggestions: Layer 2 Scaling, Smart Contract Platforms, Developer Ecosystem
pwFlaggedReason: Flagged: The application contains ambiguous descriptions about the contributions to the Optimism ecosystem and impact on it, thus potentially violating the rule against false statements & deception.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, it is incorrectly categorized. The application uses first person pronouns like "My" which suggests that the applicant is an individual, not a project.
